subject: British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Louis Oosthuizen, a 27-year-old from South Africa, cruised to a round of 71 and a seven-stroke victory over Lee Westwood to win his first major championship.
snippet: Louis Oosthuizen, a 27-year-old from South Africa, cruised to a round of 71 and a seven-stroke victory over Lee Westwood to win his first major championship.
